name: Gateway Health Check
description: Quick health check of the rj-gateway on startup. Verifies all endpoints respond, tool list is complete, Setec connectivity works, and audit logging is functional.
process: Call tools/list and verify 43 tools present
Call juggler_setec_list and verify Setec connectivity
Call juggler_audit_log and verify logging is functional
Call juggler_campaign_status and juggler_aperture_usage to verify gateway-only tools respond

metrics.successCriteria: All health checks pass, all tools respond, Setec reachable
